main event: A civilian reported observing a round red object in the sky moving north to south for 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object was the size of a nickel held at arm's length., The sighting occurred at dusk with clear visibility., The object's flight path appeared to be an arch before drifting out of sight into the horizon., No discernible features, sound, or exhaust were noted., The cause of the sighting was suggested to be due to high air traffic in the area.
